name: Google Apps Script Kickstart for Firebase Studio
description: A collection of Google Apps Script templates to jumpstart your development in Firebase Studio, promoting best practices for various project types.

options.apps-script-starter-template: Starter Template: Minimal & bare-bones for simple scripts or learning GAS.
options.apps-script-module-template: Modular Web App Template: Clean structure for Apps Script web apps with client-server interaction.
options.apps-script-api-connector-template: API Connector Template: Framework for fetching data from external APIs and syncing to Google Sheets.
